I'm concerned about the safety of the Verus software. Are there any online resources that can help me verify its security?

Yes, you can check the VirusTotal website for detection reports on the Verus software for different operating systems, such as MacOS, Linux-x86-64, Linux-ARM64, and Windows. These reports can give you an idea of whether the software is flagged as malicious by various antivirus engines.

These are warnings that you are installing mining software, which may be installed by a third party to exploit your PC.
